person.persName: Hiram Powers (Cincinnati Atto. -- Not the sculptor)

body.p: Cincinnati, Ohio, attorney and notary. Ohio native. Son of John S. Powers and Jane Powers. Law student in Cincinnati in 1860. Notary public for Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1860. Attorney in Cincinnati in 1863.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, 15th Ward Cincinnati, p. 62; Williams' Cincinnati Directory: City Guide and Business Mirror, for Year Commencing June, 1863 (Cincinnati: Williams & Company, 1863), 284. _Find A Grave, "Hiram Powers ( - 1867)," Memorial #79017122, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=79017122 (accessed Aug. 21, 2017).
